projects.title: cooksBook - Recipe Repository
projects.bodyText:
- Full-stack multi-user repository for the consumption of kitchen recipes.
 -  Built using NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, and RESTful routing.
 - Developed from inception and wire-framing to deployment with Heroku

projects.title: Trivia Night -  SPA-style Game
projects.bodyText:
- A trivia game solidifying usage of **JavaScript**, **CSS**, **HTML**, and **jQuery** with external APIs.
 - Developed plan and wireframe to complete the project on a tight deadline.
 - Dark mode support.

projects.title: LoFive - Music-themes Social Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- Full-stack MERN app, integrating multiple developers to craft a Twitter-like experience with external entertainment APIs.
 - Took the role of scrum-master and lead developer with a focus on React technologies and custom backend APIs.
 - Used a NodeJS backend for user login and sessions and the React Context API for front-end user info.
 - Deployed on **heroku**.

projects.title: ZEVHUB - Electric Mobolity Marketplace
projects.bodyText:
Ecommerce marketplace application for the sale of electronic mobility.
 - Front and backend developed entirely by me with the MERN stack
 - Used a NodeJS backend for a remote server, the React API for front-end user interface, and Redux for state management.
 - Deployed on **heroku**.
